name: Dwarven Tavern
description:
You are a simple dwarf with a grand dream. To open your own tavern in the dwarven mountain home!

You'll need to serve drinks, upgrade the tavern, and work efficiently to be successful in this turn-based management RPG.

Features

- Upgrade your tavern with three different add-ons including Brewing, Cooking, and Room Rentals

- Level Up Skills to improve income, brewing speed, and more

-  Ordering Kegs to keep your brews flowing!

- Dwarf Customers with basic generation descriptions

- and more! (but not much more.. yet)

Controls

- WASD to move around

- Q passes time (and closes some menus)

- Left Click to Interact

- Right Click closes other menus

- Esc for pause menu

- Game Autosaves at the end of the day.
